name: Movie Picker
description: Movie DB will suggest a movie based on the user's inputted criteria. It will return a movie name, a poster, a summary of the plot, a rating and a trailer. The user can also saved movies to a list of favourites to watch later

name: Coding Quiz
description: Coding quiz will present the user with a dynamically generated questions and a list of answers. After completing the quiz the user can save thier scores to the local storage.

name: Workday Scheduler
description: Work day scheduler allows the user to enter in events for each hour between 9-5. Upon hitting save the data entered will be saved to the user's local storage so the webpage can be closed and re-opened while retaining the events.

name: Password Generator
description: Password generator will generate a password with between 10 and 64 characters, that will only include character types you have chosen. It is guarenteed to include at least one of each character type.

name: My Non-React Porfolio
description: This portfolio was made with just HTML and CSS to show off my coding skills at an early stage of my development.

name: My Bootstrap Porfolio
description: WEBSITE STILL UNDER DEVELOPMENT: This portfolio was made with Bootstrap which was used to easily create a mobile friendly webpage.
